amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part A of House Report 118-59 to amend the bill to require a conviction.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to require a conviction of assault on a police officer for deportation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Correa amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 225 (Roll no. 224).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Correa.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Correa amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 225 (Roll no. 224).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
